name: Resident Virus
description:
Resident Virus

The videogame is a RPG tribute to the horror games, but in a different way. The game is free, and for Windows systems (7, 8 and 10).

Can you find any survivor into this city?. Resident Virus is more than a game. It's a RPG videogame with puzzle and a lot of fun. Only the strongest can find the way to get out of this nightmare.

Run and fight like never before. Because this Virus is real.

Download Resident Virus is now available for PC. And a very importan thing. The videogame is free (I make video games for fun).

Greetings...
